title: Another zz'rot bug
body:
Hi All!

So I found another bug with everyone's favourite tower destroying item: if you die with an active portal on the map and the enemy team doesn't kill it, it'll stay up until you get revived. The moment you come back though, it does die but not until then. Essentially this extends the time it's up by potentially however long your death timer is. And how stupid/preoccupied the enemy team is.

replies.body:
THAT EXPLAINS HOW THAT HEIMERDINGER HAD ONE PORTAL FOR THE WHOLE GAME

WOW

Bug reports go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), though.
